frameDefinitions: A Cognizer carries out an approximate calculation or considers some Evidence so as to arrive at an approximate Value for some Feature of an Item.
This frame concerns an Evaluee being judged for its quality, i.e. how much it would probably be liked.
An Experimenter conducts an Experiment based on a Hypothesis.
A  Source_of_authority, typically a government, relies upon a set of institutions specialized for the administration of justice.
During a court appearance, a Sentence, generally a punishment, is imposed on the Convict by a Court, usually represented by a judge.
A Gambler commits an Asset to a prediction that an Uncertain_situation will have a particular Outcome (or class of outcomes).
frameExamples: Until 1971, dolphin mortality could be <t>estimated</t> only from analyses of vessels ' logbooks -- and the figures are probably underestimates. CNI
Johann's <t><fex name='Experiment'>experiment</fex></t> proved the new drug was effective in treating the disease.
The federal <t>judiciary</t>'s certification process is the foundation of the interpreter program. INI DNI
The judge <t>sentenced</t> Martha Stewart to 2 years in prison for insider trading.
listRoleDefinitions: The individual who considers evidence or performs calculations to arrive at an approximation.
The feature is a scalar property of the <fen>Item</fen>.
The position or area  on the <fen>Feature</fen> scale that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> concludes the <fen>Item</fen> occupies.
The entity that possesses the <fen>Feature</fen> whose <fen>Value</fen> the <fen>Cognizer</fen> seeks to approximate.
A proposition expressing the <fen>Cognizer</fen>'s approximation of a <fen>Feature</fen>'s <fen>Value</fen>.
An open proposition for which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> seeks to approximate the <fen>Value</fen> of a variable.
The time period during which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> forms the estimate of the <fen>Feature</fen>'s <fen>Value</fen>.
The location in which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> forms their estimate.
The <fen>Evaluee</fen> is being judged for its quality.
This role marks expressions that denote a scalar property of the <fen>Evaluee</fen> with respect to which the <fen>Evaluee</fen> is judged.
The <fen>Experimenter</fen> is the individual conducting the <fen>Experiment</fen>.
The group of entities in the <fen>Experiment</fen> which have not been treated and are compared to the <fen>Treatment_group</fen> or <fen>Treated_individual</fen>.
An individual entity of the <fen>Experiment</fen> which is left untreated and then compared with the <fen>Treatment_group</fen> or the <fen>Treated_individual</fen>.
A group of subjects that receive Treatment and are compared to the <fen>Control_group</fen> or <fex name='Controlled_individual'>Controlled_individuals</fex>.
An individual subject that receives treatment and is then compared to the <fen>Control_group</fen> or <fen>Controlled_individual</fen>.
The test or <fen>Experiment</fen> conducted by the <fen>Experimenter</fen> using a <fen>Control_group</fen> and a <fen>Treatment_group</fen>.
The <fen>Hypothesis</fen> is a conjecture as to the result of an <fen>Experiment</fen>.  The <fen>Experiment</fen> takes place in order to prove the <fen>Hypothesis</fen> as correct or incorrect.

In this frame <fen>Control_group</fen> and <fen>Treatment_group</fen> can be combined and expressed as <fen>Subjects</fen>.  This role can also be used for a generic individual on whom the <fen>Experiment</fen> is being conducted (see second example).
The <fen>Topic</fen> is the subject that the <fen>Experiment</fen> is studying.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Experimenter</fen> conducts the <fen>Experiment</fen>.
The <fen>Place</fen> in which the <fen>Experiment</fen> is conducted.
A permanent organization with the socially important purpose of administering justice.
The concern of the <fen>Judicial_body</fen>-- broadly speaking, the aspect of society that they affect.

The responsibility that a <fen>Judicial_body</fen> has, either defined in terms of the type of cases that they can hear, or more specifically by reference to an action that the authority constituting them wishes the <fen>Judicial_body</fen>  to achieve.
The geographical area within which the <fen>Judicial_body</fen> has authority and responsibility.
The place where the <fen>Judicial_body</fen> is located.
The <fen>Convict</fen> is given a <fen>Sentence</fen> by the <fen>Court</fen>.
The <fen>Court</fen> imposes a <fen>Sentence</fen> on a <fen>Convict</fen>.
The <fen>Sentence</fen> is imposed on the <fen>Convict</fen> by the <fen>Court</fen>.
This role denotes the duration of the sentence.
The illegal action of which the <fen>Convict</fen> has been found guilty and for which they are punished.
The Time when the <fen>Convict</fen> is sentenced.
The location of the sentencing <fen>Court</fen>.
The person who wages the <fen>Asset</fen> on a certain Outcome.
Something desirable possessed by or directly associated with the <fen>Gambler</fen> which is lost if the <fen>Gambler</fen> loses the wager.
The <fen>Gambler</fen> predicts that a certain <fen>Outcome</fen> will hold.
The <fen>Gambler</fen> predicts how an <fen>Uncertain_situation</fen> will resolve.
The time when the <fen>Gambler</fen> makes the wager.
The place where the <fen>Gambler</fen> makes the wager.
listRoleExamples: <fex>The government</fex> estimated the cost of meeting EC water standards at £3-4 billion.

In one march from 42 Street down to Washington Square Park, the crowds were
estimated <fex>in size</fex> from 125000 (NYPD estimate) to over 200000 (march organizers).
Sotheby 's have estimated its value <fex>at $10m-$14m</fex>.
I estimated <fex>the house</fex> at about 60-65% full.
At the time they estimated <fex>there to be as many as four million to the acre</fex>.
Then Sandia estimated <fex>how many people would die and be injured within the first year due to their radiation exposure</fex>.
The US Forest Service estimated <fex>last year</fex> that 45 million piñons have died so far in north-central New Mexico.
<fex>At the London School of Economics</fex> they estimated that China would have to spend 2% of gross. domestic product on higher. education for 15 years
He gave me another lame <fex>excuse</fex>.
The Beaujolais Nouveau is dazzling <fex>in freshness</fex>.
<fex>Justin's</fex> experiment turned out to be rather successful.
<fex>One rat's</fex> treatment caused it to outlive the rats of the control group.
Katrina tested <fex>her hypothesis</fex> yesterday afternoon.
They were hoping to conduct an experiment <fex>on the albino rats</fex>.
Jimmy conducted an experiment <fex>on tropical plants in non-tropical environments</fex>.
The International Monetary Fund Administrative <fex><t>Tribunal</t></fex> (IMFAT) adjudicates employment disputes between staff members and the IMF.

Anything you say or write can and will be held against you in
a court <fex>of law</fex>.
The International Criminal Tribunal <fex>for Rwanda</fex> sentenced Mikaeli Muhimana on April 28 to life imprisonment.
On February 18, 1983, the Supreme Court <fex>of Alabama</fex> denied this motion.
Judge Duncan sentenced <fex>Marty</fex> to five years under house detention.
<fex>Judge Duncan</fex> sentenced Marty to five years under house detention.
Judge Duncan sentenced Marty <fex>to five years under house detention</fex>.
Tom will recieve a <t>sentence</t> <fex>of five years</fex>.
A pet store owner was sentenced <fex>for illegaly smuggling protected reptiles</fex>.
He will be sentenced <fex>at a later date</fex>.
Biancaniello will be sentenced <fex>in San Francisco</fex> later this summer.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: the end of the first half
